alert.note: Alert for Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 12 at 3:30AM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of up to 2 to 4 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Willapa Hills. * WHEN...From 4 AM Saturday morning to 4 AM PST Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The timing of accumulating snow onset has pushed back to early Saturday morning as the weather system track has shifted south. There may be snow flurries in occasional showers on Friday with no accumulating snow. Snow amounts will depend on how quickly accumulating snow begins on Saturday and diminishes early Sunday morning, which remains uncertain.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
